Deals

Deals & Coupons
===============

**Coupons & Gift Cards**  
– Code: SAMOSACHAT | BOGO [Samosa Chat](https://www.toasttab.com/himalayan-restaurant-niles/)
 (Niles)  
 

**Deals**  
– [Family meal deal for 3 – 4](https://himalayanrestaurant.com/family-speical-meal-deal/)
 Niles-Chicago  
– [Family meal deal for 5 – 6](https://himalayanrestaurant.com/family-speical-meal-deal/)
 Niles-Chicago

Family Special Meal Deal
========================

We have created a FAMILY MEAL FOR 4 / 6 deals that has your favorite classic selection of North Indian and Nepalese food. Along with the meal we also offer the popular add-ons and also wine, beer to make it a better experience for all.  It is available for dine-in, pickup and delivery everyday.

_**Family meal deal for party of 3 – 4** This family meal comprises selection of:_

_Select 1 appetizer: veg cocktail samosas, masala fries, veg spring rolls_  
_3 traditional entrees: dal makhani, chana masala, baigan bharta, mutter paneer, palak paneer, chicken tikka masala, chicken makhani, chicken curry_  
_1 basmati rice and 3 butter naan – designed for at least 3 – 4 people_

_**Family meal deal for party of 5 – 6** This family meal comprises selection of:_

_Select 2 appetizers: veg cocktail samosas, masala fries, veg spring rolls_  
_4 traditional entrees: dal makhani, chana masala, baigan bharta, mutter paneer, palak paneer, chicken tikka masala, chicken makhani, chicken curry_  
_2 basmati rice and 3 butter naan – designed for at least 6 people_

_**Complete Vegetarian Meal for 2** This meal comprises selection of:_

_Pick 2 entrees: Paneer Tikka Masala, Dal Makhani, Palak Paneer, Mutter Panner, Baigan Bharta_  
_Served with:  Vegetable Samosa, Naan, Rice and Gulab Jamun_

_**Complete Non Vegetarian Meal for 2** This meal comprises selection of:_

_Select 2 appetizers: Lamb Curry, Chicken Tikka Masala, Chicken Curry, Chicken Makhani_  
_Served with: Half order Tandoori Chicken, Naan, Rice and Gulab Jamun_

> **Easy to order:**  
> Call us at 312.877.5999 **[Order Himalayan Chicago](https://www.toasttab.com/himalayan-restaurant)** | 847-324-4150 **[Order Himalayan Niles](https://www.toasttab.com/himalayan-restaurant-niles)
> **

* * *

 , [Himalayan](https://himalayanrestaurant.com/category/himalayan)
 , [Food](https://himalayanrestaurant.com/category/food)

* * *

Popular Items
=============

[Most popular items of the restaurant](https://himalayanrestaurant.com/popular-items)

slide 1 to 3 of 6

![](https://himalayanrestaurant.com/storage/menu_item/65700b1ec0171.jpg)

Chicken Biryani
===============

Basmati rice flavored and cooked with Chicken in chef’s special biryani Masala.

![](https://himalayanrestaurant.com/storage/menu_item/65793e73da434.jpg)

Chicken Tikka Masala
====================

Expert Marinated chicken breast cooked in creamy onion tomato sauce.

![](https://himalayanrestaurant.com/storage/menu_item/65793eb167c20.jpg)

Sheesh Kebab
============

Minced lamb blended in chef's combination of herbs and spices, roasted in clay oven

![](https://himalayanrestaurant.com/storage/menu_item/65793f6e6b56d.jpg)

Chicken Momo
============

The momo embodies many cultures into a single entity.

![](https://himalayanrestaurant.com/storage/menu_item/65793fb21b911.jpg)

Tandoori Prawn
==============

Jumbo prawn roasted in clay oven and cooked in special seasoned sauce.

![](https://himalayanrestaurant.com/storage/menu_item/65793ff970012.jpg)

Samosa Chat
===========

Crispy samosas topped with Tangy and Spicy yogurt and chutney.

**Introducing:**  
[Himalayan Express Lunch](https://himalayanrestaurant.com/himalayan-express-lunch-specials/)
  
[Samosa](https://himalayanrestaurant.com/2020/08/16/himalayan-samosa-chat/)
 [Chaat](https://himalayanrestaurant.com/himalayan-samosa-chaat/)
  
[Shimp Chili](https://himalayanrestaurant.com/shrimp-chilli-seafood/)

Please note: Price listed here are subjected to change without notice. In order to order wine and beer, one must be 21 years or older. Some of the promotions might not be available or expired, please call to confirm.

> _**Easy to order:**_  
> _Call us at 312.877.5999_ [_**Order Himalayan Chicago**_](https://www.toasttab.com/himalayan-restaurant)
>  _| 847-324-4150_ [_**Order Himalayan Niles**_](https://www.toasttab.com/himalayan-restaurant-niles)

Himalayan Restaurant Family style Nepalese & North Indian Cusinise serving Chicago South Loop and Niles Northshore since 1993. Indian & Nepali Cuisine Family and Kid friendly homestyle cooking Nepali & Indian Restaurant
